abstract: NRG Energy is stepping up its efforts to fend off a hostile takeover attempt from Exelon, a rival power operator, ahead of next week’s deadline for NRG shareholders to tender their stock.
lead_paragraph: NRG Energy is stepping up its efforts to fend off a hostile takeover attempt from Exelon, a rival power operator, ahead of next week’s deadline for NRG shareholders to tender their stock.

headline.main: NRG Blasts Exelon Bid as Deadline Approaches
